{"id":600996803,"lang":"cpp","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1639361528,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/600996803/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Consecutive Characters","memory":"6.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxPower(string s) {\n        int c=1,mx=1;\n        for(int i=0;i<s.size()-1;i++){\n            if(s[i]==s[i+1])c++;\n            else{\n                if(c>mx)mx=c;\n                c=1;\n            }\n        }\n        return max(c,mx);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"consecutive-characters"}
